summary: Allows you to grow a Telvanni mushroom tower
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=20]This mod is dead[/size]
[/color]
This mod is dead meaning for the foreseeable future it will not be updated. If you want a mod similar to this try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59558/?]Tel Nalta II - Telvanni Home[/url]

[color=#008000][size=15]Description[/color][/b][/size]

This mod adds a spell that can be acquired by talking to Neloth after the player becomes a member of house Telvanni. The spell allows you to grow a Telvanni mushroom tower in one of the three available locations. The spell is completely free to use and costs nothing to obtain. This
may change in the future but for now its free. Once used the spell is permanent and cannot be used again so choose your location wisely. Once again this may not always be the case so I suggest you watch for any changes. All content in this mod will not appear unless made to by the player.

[color=green][b][size=15]Contents[/b][/color][/size]

[color=green][u]Exteriors:[/u][/color]
Raven Rock
Lake Ilinalta
Alftand

[color=green][u]Interiors:[/u][/color]
A house for your follower
A garden for all of your alchemy needs

[color=green][u]Main Home[/u][/color]
An alteration spell that grows your home in one of the three previously listed locations.
Alchemy table
Enchanting table
Staff enchanter
Teleporter and teleportation spell to take you back to your home at anytime.
Study
Kitchen
Bedroom
Vault with a mannequin, display case, chest, and two black book holders.


[youtube]07xGVSgmjOY[/youtube]


[color=green][b][size=15]Bugs[/b][/color][/size]

The stands for the black books don't work. If someone knows how to fix them I would appreciate some help.

[color=green][b][size=15]Installation[/b][/color][/size]

[color=orange]NMM:[/color] After download activate the mod and your done.

[color=blue]Manuel:[/color] Extract to your main Skyrim directory.

[color=grey]Steam Workshop Download:[/color] http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=160158359&searchtext=


[color=red][b][size=15]Endorse if you like[/b][/color][/size]
author: ArtificialSloth
